div.bibl: Star, Apr. 1, 1904, p. 2 BELIEVE IT OR NOT.

body.p: John Michalopoulos, a harness-maker at 68 Blue Island Avenue, who recently came to Chicago and opened a shop to ply his trade, has a big sign before his establishment which reads as follows:

"We will make you the best harness. We take your measurement and guarantee the fit. Our harnesses are soft and pliable and do not irritate the neck. Give us a trial, and you will be convinced of their superior quality. Get yours to-day."
